org.restlet.data
Interface Data

All Superinterfaces:
Element
All Known Subinterfaces:
CharacterSet, ControlData, Cookie, CookieSetting, Form, Language, MediaType, Metadata, Method, Parameter, Preference, Reference, Representation, RepresentationMetadata, Status, Tag
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRepresentation, CharacterSets, DefaultRepresentationMetadata, EmptyValue, Languages, MediaTypes, Methods, Statuses
public interface Data
extends Element

Element of information handled by a component via a connector.

"A datum is an element of information that is transferred from a component, or received by a component, via a connector." Roy T. Fielding

See Also:
Source dissertation
